argument.name: rowNumber
argument.description: Optional. Zero based row number of item footer to show. If omitted, current row is used.

argument.name: animationObject
argument.description: Optional. A JSON object that defines animation settings.

argument.name: mode
argument.description: Optional. Defaults to 'toggle'. Can be one of the following values:

item.name: toggle
item.description: Default value. Toggles display of the footer. If the footer is shown, it will be hidden. If the footer is hidden, it will be shown.

page.description: Toggle display of a List item footer.

section.title: Discussion
section.discussion: Used for List controls that have a 'List Item footer'. Allows you to set the visibility of the List item footer. You can optionally specify animation when the footer is shown/hidden.
